description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 10x + 3.
comments: n, 10*n+3, 100*n+33 and 1000*n+333 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..450000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(10*n+3) and IsPrime(100*n+33) and IsPrime(1000*n+333)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
